00056 typedef struct BoidValues {
00057     float max_speed, max_acc;
00058     float max_ave, min_speed;
00059     float personal_space, jump_speed;
00060 } BoidValues;

00064 static int rule_none(BoidRule *UNUSED(rule), BoidBrainData *UNUSED(data), BoidValues *UNUSED(val), ParticleData *UNUSED(pa))

00069 static int rule_goal_avoid(BoidRule *rule, BoidBrainData *bbd, BoidValues *val, ParticleData *pa)
00070 {
00071     BoidRuleGoalAvoid *gabr = (BoidRuleGoalAvoid*) rule;
00072     BoidSettings *boids = bbd->part->boids;
00073     BoidParticle *bpa = pa->boid;
00074     EffectedPoint epoint;
00075     ListBase *effectors = bbd->sim->psys->effectors;
00076     EffectorCache *cur, *eff = NULL;
00077     EffectorCache temp_eff;
00078     EffectorData efd, cur_efd;
00079     float mul = (rule->type == eBoidRuleType_Avoid ? 1.0 : -1.0);
00080     float priority = 0.0f, len = 0.0f;
00081     int ret = 0;
00082 
00083     pd_point_from_particle(bbd->sim, pa, &pa->state, &epoint);
00084 
00085     /* first find out goal/predator with highest priority */
00086     if (effectors) for (cur = effectors->first; cur; cur=cur->next) {
00087         Object *eob = cur->ob;
00088         PartDeflect *pd = cur->pd;
00089 
00090         if (gabr->ob && (rule->type != eBoidRuleType_Goal || gabr->ob != bpa->ground)) {
00091             if (gabr->ob == eob) {
00092                 /* TODO: effectors with multiple points */
00093                 if (get_effector_data(cur, &efd, &epoint, 0)) {
00094                     if (cur->pd && cur->pd->forcefield == PFIELD_BOID)
00095                         priority = mul * pd->f_strength * effector_falloff(cur, &efd, &epoint, bbd->part->effector_weights);
00096                     else
00097                         priority = 1.0;
00098 
00099                     eff = cur;
00100                 }
00101                 break;
00102             }
00103         }
00104         else if (rule->type == eBoidRuleType_Goal && eob == bpa->ground)
00105             ; /* skip current object */
00106         else if (pd->forcefield == PFIELD_BOID && mul * pd->f_strength > 0.0f && get_effector_data(cur, &cur_efd, &epoint, 0)) {
00107             float temp = mul * pd->f_strength * effector_falloff(cur, &cur_efd, &epoint, bbd->part->effector_weights);
00108 
00109             if (temp == 0.0f)
00110                 ; /* do nothing */
00111             else if (temp > priority) {
00112                 priority = temp;
00113                 eff = cur;
00114                 efd = cur_efd;
00115                 len = efd.distance;
00116             }
00117             /* choose closest object with same priority */
00118             else if (temp == priority && efd.distance < len) {
00119                 eff = cur;
00120                 efd = cur_efd;
00121                 len = efd.distance;
00122             }
00123         }
00124     }
00125 
00126     /* if the object doesn't have effector data we have to fake it */
00127     if (eff == NULL && gabr->ob) {
00128         memset(&temp_eff, 0, sizeof(EffectorCache));
00129         temp_eff.ob = gabr->ob;
00130         temp_eff.scene = bbd->sim->scene;
00131         eff = &temp_eff;
00132         get_effector_data(eff, &efd, &epoint, 0);
00133         priority = 1.0f;
00134     }
00135 
00136     /* then use that effector */
00137     if (priority > (rule->type==eBoidRuleType_Avoid ? gabr->fear_factor : 0.0f)) { /* with avoid, factor is "fear factor" */
00138         Object *eob = eff->ob;
00139         PartDeflect *pd = eff->pd;
00140         float surface = (pd && pd->shape == PFIELD_SHAPE_SURFACE) ? 1.0f : 0.0f;
00141 
00142         if (gabr->options & BRULE_GOAL_AVOID_PREDICT) {
00143             /* estimate future location of target */
00144             get_effector_data(eff, &efd, &epoint, 1);
00145 
00146             mul_v3_fl(efd.vel, efd.distance / (val->max_speed * bbd->timestep));
00147             add_v3_v3(efd.loc, efd.vel);
00148             sub_v3_v3v3(efd.vec_to_point, pa->prev_state.co, efd.loc);
00149             efd.distance = len_v3(efd.vec_to_point);
00150         }
00151 
00152         if (rule->type == eBoidRuleType_Goal && boids->options & BOID_ALLOW_CLIMB && surface!=0.0f) {
00153             if (!bbd->goal_ob || bbd->goal_priority < priority) {
00154                 bbd->goal_ob = eob;
00155                 copy_v3_v3(bbd->goal_co, efd.loc);
00156                 copy_v3_v3(bbd->goal_nor, efd.nor);
00157             }
00158         }
00159         else if (rule->type == eBoidRuleType_Avoid && bpa->data.mode == eBoidMode_Climbing &&
00160             priority > 2.0f * gabr->fear_factor) {
00161             /* detach from surface and try to fly away from danger */
00162             negate_v3_v3(efd.vec_to_point, bpa->gravity);
00163         }
00164 
00165         copy_v3_v3(bbd->wanted_co, efd.vec_to_point);
00166         mul_v3_fl(bbd->wanted_co, mul);
00167 
00168         bbd->wanted_speed = val->max_speed * priority;
00169 
00170         /* with goals factor is approach velocity factor */
00171         if (rule->type == eBoidRuleType_Goal && boids->landing_smoothness > 0.0f) {
00172             float len2 = 2.0f*len_v3(pa->prev_state.vel);
00173 
00174             surface *= pa->size * boids->height;
00175 
00176             if (len2 > 0.0f && efd.distance - surface < len2) {
00177                 len2 = (efd.distance - surface)/len2;
00178                 bbd->wanted_speed *= powf(len2, boids->landing_smoothness);
00179             }
00180         }
00181 
00182         ret = 1;
00183     }
00184 
00185     return ret;
00186 }

00188 static int rule_avoid_collision(BoidRule *rule, BoidBrainData *bbd, BoidValues *val, ParticleData *pa)
00189 {
00190     BoidRuleAvoidCollision *acbr = (BoidRuleAvoidCollision*) rule;
00191     KDTreeNearest *ptn = NULL;
00192     ParticleTarget *pt;
00193     BoidParticle *bpa = pa->boid;
00194     ColliderCache *coll;
00195     float vec[3] = {0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f}, loc[3] = {0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f};
00196     float co1[3], vel1[3], co2[3], vel2[3];
00197     float  len, t, inp, t_min = 2.0f;
00198     int n, neighbors = 0, nearest = 0;
00199     int ret = 0;
00200 
00201     //check deflector objects first
00202     if (acbr->options & BRULE_ACOLL_WITH_DEFLECTORS && bbd->sim->colliders) {
00203         ParticleCollision col;
00204         BVHTreeRayHit hit;
00205         float radius = val->personal_space * pa->size, ray_dir[3];
00206 
00207         copy_v3_v3(col.co1, pa->prev_state.co);
00208         add_v3_v3v3(col.co2, pa->prev_state.co, pa->prev_state.vel);
00209         sub_v3_v3v3(ray_dir, col.co2, col.co1);
00210         mul_v3_fl(ray_dir, acbr->look_ahead);
00211         col.f = 0.0f;
00212         hit.index = -1;
00213         hit.dist = col.original_ray_length = len_v3(ray_dir);
00214 
00215         /* find out closest deflector object */
00216         for (coll = bbd->sim->colliders->first; coll; coll=coll->next) {
00217             /* don't check with current ground object */
00218             if (coll->ob == bpa->ground)
00219                 continue;
00220 
00221             col.current = coll->ob;
00222             col.md = coll->collmd;
00223 
00224             if (col.md && col.md->bvhtree)
00225                 BLI_bvhtree_ray_cast(col.md->bvhtree, col.co1, ray_dir, radius, &hit, BKE_psys_collision_neartest_cb, &col);
00226         }
00227         /* then avoid that object */
00228         if (hit.index>=0) {
00229             t = hit.dist/col.original_ray_length;
00230 
00231             /* avoid head-on collision */
00232             if (dot_v3v3(col.pce.nor, pa->prev_state.ave) < -0.99f) {
00233                 /* don't know why, but uneven range [0.0,1.0] */
00234                 /* works much better than even [-1.0,1.0] */
00235                 bbd->wanted_co[0] = BLI_frand();
00236                 bbd->wanted_co[1] = BLI_frand();
00237                 bbd->wanted_co[2] = BLI_frand();
00238             }
00239             else {
00240                 copy_v3_v3(bbd->wanted_co, col.pce.nor);
00241             }
00242 
00243             mul_v3_fl(bbd->wanted_co, (1.0f - t) * val->personal_space * pa->size);
00244 
00245             bbd->wanted_speed = sqrtf(t) * len_v3(pa->prev_state.vel);
00246             bbd->wanted_speed = MAX2(bbd->wanted_speed, val->min_speed);
00247 
00248             return 1;
00249         }
00250     }
00251 
00252     //check boids in own system
00253     if (acbr->options & BRULE_ACOLL_WITH_BOIDS) {
00254         neighbors = BLI_kdtree_range_search(bbd->sim->psys->tree, acbr->look_ahead * len_v3(pa->prev_state.vel), pa->prev_state.co, pa->prev_state.ave, &ptn);
00255         if (neighbors > 1) for (n=1; n<neighbors; n++) {
00256             copy_v3_v3(co1, pa->prev_state.co);
00257             copy_v3_v3(vel1, pa->prev_state.vel);
00258             copy_v3_v3(co2, (bbd->sim->psys->particles + ptn[n].index)->prev_state.co);
00259             copy_v3_v3(vel2, (bbd->sim->psys->particles + ptn[n].index)->prev_state.vel);
00260 
00261             sub_v3_v3v3(loc, co1, co2);
00262 
00263             sub_v3_v3v3(vec, vel1, vel2);
00264             
00265             inp = dot_v3v3(vec,vec);
00266 
00267             /* velocities not parallel */
00268             if (inp != 0.0f) {
00269                 t = -dot_v3v3(loc, vec)/inp;
00270                 /* cpa is not too far in the future so investigate further */
00271                 if (t > 0.0f && t < t_min) {
00272                     madd_v3_v3fl(co1, vel1, t);
00273                     madd_v3_v3fl(co2, vel2, t);
00274                     
00275                     sub_v3_v3v3(vec, co2, co1);
00276 
00277                     len = normalize_v3(vec);
00278 
00279                     /* distance of cpa is close enough */
00280                     if (len < 2.0f * val->personal_space * pa->size) {
00281                         t_min = t;
00282 
00283                         mul_v3_fl(vec, len_v3(vel1));
00284                         mul_v3_fl(vec, (2.0f - t)/2.0f);
00285                         sub_v3_v3v3(bbd->wanted_co, vel1, vec);
00286                         bbd->wanted_speed = len_v3(bbd->wanted_co);
00287                         ret = 1;
00288                     }
00289                 }
00290             }
00291         }
00292     }
00293     if (ptn) { MEM_freeN(ptn); ptn=NULL; }
00294 
00295     /* check boids in other systems */
00296     for (pt=bbd->sim->psys->targets.first; pt; pt=pt->next) {
00297         ParticleSystem *epsys = psys_get_target_system(bbd->sim->ob, pt);
00298 
00299         if (epsys) {
00300             neighbors = BLI_kdtree_range_search(epsys->tree, acbr->look_ahead * len_v3(pa->prev_state.vel), pa->prev_state.co, pa->prev_state.ave, &ptn);
00301             if (neighbors > 0) for (n=0; n<neighbors; n++) {
00302                 copy_v3_v3(co1, pa->prev_state.co);
00303                 copy_v3_v3(vel1, pa->prev_state.vel);
00304                 copy_v3_v3(co2, (epsys->particles + ptn[n].index)->prev_state.co);
00305                 copy_v3_v3(vel2, (epsys->particles + ptn[n].index)->prev_state.vel);
00306 
00307                 sub_v3_v3v3(loc, co1, co2);
00308 
00309                 sub_v3_v3v3(vec, vel1, vel2);
00310                 
00311                 inp = dot_v3v3(vec,vec);
00312 
00313                 /* velocities not parallel */
00314                 if (inp != 0.0f) {
00315                     t = -dot_v3v3(loc, vec)/inp;
00316                     /* cpa is not too far in the future so investigate further */
00317                     if (t > 0.0f && t < t_min) {
00318                         madd_v3_v3fl(co1, vel1, t);
00319                         madd_v3_v3fl(co2, vel2, t);
00320                         
00321                         sub_v3_v3v3(vec, co2, co1);
00322 
00323                         len = normalize_v3(vec);
00324 
00325                         /* distance of cpa is close enough */
00326                         if (len < 2.0f * val->personal_space * pa->size) {
00327                             t_min = t;
00328 
00329                             mul_v3_fl(vec, len_v3(vel1));
00330                             mul_v3_fl(vec, (2.0f - t)/2.0f);
00331                             sub_v3_v3v3(bbd->wanted_co, vel1, vec);
00332                             bbd->wanted_speed = len_v3(bbd->wanted_co);
00333                             ret = 1;
00334                         }
00335                     }
00336                 }
00337             }
00338 
00339             if (ptn) { MEM_freeN(ptn); ptn=NULL; }
00340         }
00341     }
00342 
00343 
00344     if (ptn && nearest==0)
00345         MEM_freeN(ptn);
00346 
00347     return ret;
00348 }
00349 static int rule_separate(BoidRule *UNUSED(rule), BoidBrainData *bbd, BoidValues *val, ParticleData *pa)
00350 {
00351     KDTreeNearest *ptn = NULL;
00352     ParticleTarget *pt;
00353     float len = 2.0f * val->personal_space * pa->size + 1.0f;
00354     float vec[3] = {0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f};
00355     int neighbors = BLI_kdtree_range_search(bbd->sim->psys->tree, 2.0f * val->personal_space * pa->size, pa->prev_state.co, NULL, &ptn);
00356     int ret = 0;
00357 
00358     if (neighbors > 1 && ptn[1].dist!=0.0f) {
00359         sub_v3_v3v3(vec, pa->prev_state.co, bbd->sim->psys->particles[ptn[1].index].state.co);
00360         mul_v3_fl(vec, (2.0f * val->personal_space * pa->size - ptn[1].dist) / ptn[1].dist);
00361         add_v3_v3(bbd->wanted_co, vec);
00362         bbd->wanted_speed = val->max_speed;
00363         len = ptn[1].dist;
00364         ret = 1;
00365     }
00366     if (ptn) { MEM_freeN(ptn); ptn=NULL; }
00367 
00368     /* check other boid systems */
00369     for (pt=bbd->sim->psys->targets.first; pt; pt=pt->next) {
00370         ParticleSystem *epsys = psys_get_target_system(bbd->sim->ob, pt);
00371 
00372         if (epsys) {
00373             neighbors = BLI_kdtree_range_search(epsys->tree, 2.0f * val->personal_space * pa->size, pa->prev_state.co, NULL, &ptn);
00374             
00375             if (neighbors > 0 && ptn[0].dist < len) {
00376                 sub_v3_v3v3(vec, pa->prev_state.co, ptn[0].co);
00377                 mul_v3_fl(vec, (2.0f * val->personal_space * pa->size - ptn[0].dist) / ptn[1].dist);
00378                 add_v3_v3(bbd->wanted_co, vec);
00379                 bbd->wanted_speed = val->max_speed;
00380                 len = ptn[0].dist;
00381                 ret = 1;
00382             }
00383 
00384             if (ptn) { MEM_freeN(ptn); ptn=NULL; }
00385         }
00386     }
00387     return ret;
00388 }
00389 static int rule_flock(BoidRule *UNUSED(rule), BoidBrainData *bbd, BoidValues *UNUSED(val), ParticleData *pa)
00390 {
00391     KDTreeNearest ptn[11];
00392     float vec[3] = {0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f}, loc[3] = {0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f};
00393     int neighbors = BLI_kdtree_find_n_nearest(bbd->sim->psys->tree, 11, pa->state.co, pa->prev_state.ave, ptn);
00394     int n;
00395     int ret = 0;
00396 
00397     if (neighbors > 1) {
00398         for (n=1; n<neighbors; n++) {
00399             add_v3_v3(loc, bbd->sim->psys->particles[ptn[n].index].prev_state.co);
00400             add_v3_v3(vec, bbd->sim->psys->particles[ptn[n].index].prev_state.vel);
00401         }
00402 
00403         mul_v3_fl(loc, 1.0f/((float)neighbors - 1.0f));
00404         mul_v3_fl(vec, 1.0f/((float)neighbors - 1.0f));
00405 
00406         sub_v3_v3(loc, pa->prev_state.co);
00407         sub_v3_v3(vec, pa->prev_state.vel);
00408 
00409         add_v3_v3(bbd->wanted_co, vec);
00410         add_v3_v3(bbd->wanted_co, loc);
00411         bbd->wanted_speed = len_v3(bbd->wanted_co);
00412 
00413         ret = 1;
00414     }
00415     return ret;
00416 }
00417 static int rule_follow_leader(BoidRule *rule, BoidBrainData *bbd, BoidValues *val, ParticleData *pa)
00418 {
00419     BoidRuleFollowLeader *flbr = (BoidRuleFollowLeader*) rule;
00420     float vec[3] = {0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f}, loc[3] = {0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f};
00421     float mul, len;
00422     int n = (flbr->queue_size <= 1) ? bbd->sim->psys->totpart : flbr->queue_size;
00423     int i, ret = 0, p = pa - bbd->sim->psys->particles;
00424 
00425     if (flbr->ob) {
00426         float vec2[3], t;
00427 
00428         /* first check we're not blocking the leader*/
00429         sub_v3_v3v3(vec, flbr->loc, flbr->oloc);
00430         mul_v3_fl(vec, 1.0f/bbd->timestep);
00431 
00432         sub_v3_v3v3(loc, pa->prev_state.co, flbr->oloc);
00433 
00434         mul = dot_v3v3(vec, vec);
00435 
00436         /* leader is not moving */
00437         if (mul < 0.01f) {
00438             len = len_v3(loc);
00439             /* too close to leader */
00440             if (len < 2.0f * val->personal_space * pa->size) {
00441                 copy_v3_v3(bbd->wanted_co, loc);
00442                 bbd->wanted_speed = val->max_speed;
00443                 return 1;
00444             }
00445         }
00446         else {
00447             t = dot_v3v3(loc, vec)/mul;
00448 
00449             /* possible blocking of leader in near future */
00450             if (t > 0.0f && t < 3.0f) {
00451                 copy_v3_v3(vec2, vec);
00452                 mul_v3_fl(vec2, t);
00453 
00454                 sub_v3_v3v3(vec2, loc, vec2);
00455 
00456                 len = len_v3(vec2);
00457 
00458                 if (len < 2.0f * val->personal_space * pa->size) {
00459                     copy_v3_v3(bbd->wanted_co, vec2);
00460                     bbd->wanted_speed = val->max_speed * (3.0f - t)/3.0f;
00461                     return 1;
00462                 }
00463             }
00464         }
00465 
00466         /* not blocking so try to follow leader */
00467         if (p && flbr->options & BRULE_LEADER_IN_LINE) {
00468             copy_v3_v3(vec, bbd->sim->psys->particles[p-1].prev_state.vel);
00469             copy_v3_v3(loc, bbd->sim->psys->particles[p-1].prev_state.co);
00470         }
00471         else {
00472             copy_v3_v3(loc, flbr->oloc);
00473             sub_v3_v3v3(vec, flbr->loc, flbr->oloc);
00474             mul_v3_fl(vec, 1.0f/bbd->timestep);
00475         }
00476         
00477         /* fac is seconds behind leader */
00478         madd_v3_v3fl(loc, vec, -flbr->distance);
00479 
00480         sub_v3_v3v3(bbd->wanted_co, loc, pa->prev_state.co);
00481         bbd->wanted_speed = len_v3(bbd->wanted_co);
00482             
00483         ret = 1;
00484     }
00485     else if (p % n) {
00486         float vec2[3], t, t_min = 3.0f;
00487 
00488         /* first check we're not blocking any leaders */
00489         for (i = 0; i< bbd->sim->psys->totpart; i+=n) {
00490             copy_v3_v3(vec, bbd->sim->psys->particles[i].prev_state.vel);
00491 
00492             sub_v3_v3v3(loc, pa->prev_state.co, bbd->sim->psys->particles[i].prev_state.co);
00493 
00494             mul = dot_v3v3(vec, vec);
00495 
00496             /* leader is not moving */
00497             if (mul < 0.01f) {
00498                 len = len_v3(loc);
00499                 /* too close to leader */
00500                 if (len < 2.0f * val->personal_space * pa->size) {
00501                     copy_v3_v3(bbd->wanted_co, loc);
00502                     bbd->wanted_speed = val->max_speed;
00503                     return 1;
00504                 }
00505             }
00506             else {
00507                 t = dot_v3v3(loc, vec)/mul;
00508 
00509                 /* possible blocking of leader in near future */
00510                 if (t > 0.0f && t < t_min) {
00511                     copy_v3_v3(vec2, vec);
00512                     mul_v3_fl(vec2, t);
00513 
00514                     sub_v3_v3v3(vec2, loc, vec2);
00515 
00516                     len = len_v3(vec2);
00517 
00518                     if (len < 2.0f * val->personal_space * pa->size) {
00519                         t_min = t;
00520                         copy_v3_v3(bbd->wanted_co, loc);
00521                         bbd->wanted_speed = val->max_speed * (3.0f - t)/3.0f;
00522                         ret = 1;
00523                     }
00524                 }
00525             }
00526         }
00527 
00528         if (ret) return 1;
00529 
00530         /* not blocking so try to follow leader */
00531         if (flbr->options & BRULE_LEADER_IN_LINE) {
00532             copy_v3_v3(vec, bbd->sim->psys->particles[p-1].prev_state.vel);
00533             copy_v3_v3(loc, bbd->sim->psys->particles[p-1].prev_state.co);
00534         }
00535         else {
00536             copy_v3_v3(vec, bbd->sim->psys->particles[p - p%n].prev_state.vel);
00537             copy_v3_v3(loc, bbd->sim->psys->particles[p - p%n].prev_state.co);
00538         }
00539         
00540         /* fac is seconds behind leader */
00541         madd_v3_v3fl(loc, vec, -flbr->distance);
00542 
00543         sub_v3_v3v3(bbd->wanted_co, loc, pa->prev_state.co);
00544         bbd->wanted_speed = len_v3(bbd->wanted_co);
00545         
00546         ret = 1;
00547     }
00548 
00549     return ret;
00550 }
00551 static int rule_average_speed(BoidRule *rule, BoidBrainData *bbd, BoidValues *val, ParticleData *pa)
00552 {
00553     BoidParticle *bpa = pa->boid;
00554     BoidRuleAverageSpeed *asbr = (BoidRuleAverageSpeed*)rule;
00555     float vec[3] = {0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f};
00556 
00557     if (asbr->wander > 0.0f) {
00558         /* abuse pa->r_ave for wandering */
00559         bpa->wander[0] += asbr->wander * (-1.0f + 2.0f * BLI_frand());
00560         bpa->wander[1] += asbr->wander * (-1.0f + 2.0f * BLI_frand());
00561         bpa->wander[2] += asbr->wander * (-1.0f + 2.0f * BLI_frand());
00562 
00563         normalize_v3(bpa->wander);
00564 
00565         copy_v3_v3(vec, bpa->wander);
00566 
00567         mul_qt_v3(pa->prev_state.rot, vec);
00568 
00569         copy_v3_v3(bbd->wanted_co, pa->prev_state.ave);
00570 
00571         mul_v3_fl(bbd->wanted_co, 1.1f);
00572 
00573         add_v3_v3(bbd->wanted_co, vec);
00574 
00575         /* leveling */
00576         if (asbr->level > 0.0f && psys_uses_gravity(bbd->sim)) {
00577             project_v3_v3v3(vec, bbd->wanted_co, bbd->sim->scene->physics_settings.gravity);
00578             mul_v3_fl(vec, asbr->level);
00579             sub_v3_v3(bbd->wanted_co, vec);
00580         }
00581     }
00582     else {
00583         copy_v3_v3(bbd->wanted_co, pa->prev_state.ave);
00584 
00585         /* may happen at birth */
00586         if (dot_v2v2(bbd->wanted_co,bbd->wanted_co)==0.0f) {
00587             bbd->wanted_co[0] = 2.0f*(0.5f - BLI_frand());
00588             bbd->wanted_co[1] = 2.0f*(0.5f - BLI_frand());
00589             bbd->wanted_co[2] = 2.0f*(0.5f - BLI_frand());
00590         }
00591         
00592         /* leveling */
00593         if (asbr->level > 0.0f && psys_uses_gravity(bbd->sim)) {
00594             project_v3_v3v3(vec, bbd->wanted_co, bbd->sim->scene->physics_settings.gravity);
00595             mul_v3_fl(vec, asbr->level);
00596             sub_v3_v3(bbd->wanted_co, vec);
00597         }
00598 
00599     }
00600     bbd->wanted_speed = asbr->speed * val->max_speed;
00601     
00602     return 1;
00603 }
00604 static int rule_fight(BoidRule *rule, BoidBrainData *bbd, BoidValues *val, ParticleData *pa)
00605 {
00606     BoidRuleFight *fbr = (BoidRuleFight*)rule;
00607     KDTreeNearest *ptn = NULL;
00608     ParticleTarget *pt;
00609     ParticleData *epars;
00610     ParticleData *enemy_pa = NULL;
00611     BoidParticle *bpa;
00612     /* friends & enemies */
00613     float closest_enemy[3] = {0.0f,0.0f,0.0f};
00614     float closest_dist = fbr->distance + 1.0f;
00615     float f_strength = 0.0f, e_strength = 0.0f;
00616     float health = 0.0f;
00617     int n, ret = 0;
00618 
00619     /* calculate own group strength */
00620     int neighbors = BLI_kdtree_range_search(bbd->sim->psys->tree, fbr->distance, pa->prev_state.co, NULL, &ptn);
00621     for (n=0; n<neighbors; n++) {
00622         bpa = bbd->sim->psys->particles[ptn[n].index].boid;
00623         health += bpa->data.health;
00624     }
00625 
00626     f_strength += bbd->part->boids->strength * health;
00627 
00628     if (ptn) { MEM_freeN(ptn); ptn=NULL; }
00629 
00630     /* add other friendlies and calculate enemy strength and find closest enemy */
00631     for (pt=bbd->sim->psys->targets.first; pt; pt=pt->next) {
00632         ParticleSystem *epsys = psys_get_target_system(bbd->sim->ob, pt);
00633         if (epsys) {
00634             epars = epsys->particles;
00635 
00636             neighbors = BLI_kdtree_range_search(epsys->tree, fbr->distance, pa->prev_state.co, NULL, &ptn);
00637             
00638             health = 0.0f;
00639 
00640             for (n=0; n<neighbors; n++) {
00641                 bpa = epars[ptn[n].index].boid;
00642                 health += bpa->data.health;
00643 
00644                 if (n==0 && pt->mode==PTARGET_MODE_ENEMY && ptn[n].dist < closest_dist) {
00645                     copy_v3_v3(closest_enemy, ptn[n].co);
00646                     closest_dist = ptn[n].dist;
00647                     enemy_pa = epars + ptn[n].index;
00648                 }
00649             }
00650             if (pt->mode==PTARGET_MODE_ENEMY)
00651                 e_strength += epsys->part->boids->strength * health;
00652             else if (pt->mode==PTARGET_MODE_FRIEND)
00653                 f_strength += epsys->part->boids->strength * health;
00654 
00655             if (ptn) { MEM_freeN(ptn); ptn=NULL; }
00656         }
00657     }
00658     /* decide action if enemy presence found */
00659     if (e_strength > 0.0f) {
00660         sub_v3_v3v3(bbd->wanted_co, closest_enemy, pa->prev_state.co);
00661 
00662         /* attack if in range */
00663         if (closest_dist <= bbd->part->boids->range + pa->size + enemy_pa->size) {
00664             float damage = BLI_frand();
00665             float enemy_dir[3];
00666 
00667             normalize_v3_v3(enemy_dir, bbd->wanted_co);
00668 
00669             /* fight mode */
00670             bbd->wanted_speed = 0.0f;
00671 
00672             /* must face enemy to fight */
00673             if (dot_v3v3(pa->prev_state.ave, enemy_dir)>0.5f) {
00674                 bpa = enemy_pa->boid;
00675                 bpa->data.health -= bbd->part->boids->strength * bbd->timestep * ((1.0f-bbd->part->boids->accuracy)*damage + bbd->part->boids->accuracy);
00676             }
00677         }
00678         else {
00679             /* approach mode */
00680             bbd->wanted_speed = val->max_speed;
00681         }
00682 
00683         /* check if boid doesn't want to fight */
00684         bpa = pa->boid;
00685         if (bpa->data.health/bbd->part->boids->health * bbd->part->boids->aggression < e_strength / f_strength) {
00686             /* decide to flee */
00687             if (closest_dist < fbr->flee_distance * fbr->distance) {
00688                 negate_v3(bbd->wanted_co);
00689                 bbd->wanted_speed = val->max_speed;
00690             }
00691             else { /* wait for better odds */
00692                 bbd->wanted_speed = 0.0f;
00693             }
00694         }
00695 
00696         ret = 1;
00697     }
00698 
00699     return ret;
00700 }
00701 
00702 typedef int (*boid_rule_cb)(BoidRule *rule, BoidBrainData *data, BoidValues *val, ParticleData *pa);
00703 
00704 static boid_rule_cb boid_rules[] = {
00705     rule_none,
00706     rule_goal_avoid,
00707     rule_goal_avoid,
00708     rule_avoid_collision,
00709     rule_separate,
00710     rule_flock,
00711     rule_follow_leader,
00712     rule_average_speed,
00713     rule_fight,
00714     //rule_help,
00715     //rule_protect,
00716     //rule_hide,
00717     //rule_follow_path,
00718     //rule_follow_wall
00719 };
00720 
00721 static void set_boid_values(BoidValues *val, BoidSettings *boids, ParticleData *pa)
00722 {
00723     BoidParticle *bpa = pa->boid;
00724 
00725     if (ELEM(bpa->data.mode, eBoidMode_OnLand, eBoidMode_Climbing)) {
00726         val->max_speed = boids->land_max_speed * bpa->data.health/boids->health;
00727         val->max_acc = boids->land_max_acc * val->max_speed;
00728         val->max_ave = boids->land_max_ave * (float)M_PI * bpa->data.health/boids->health;
00729         val->min_speed = 0.0f; /* no minimum speed on land */
00730         val->personal_space = boids->land_personal_space;
00731         val->jump_speed = boids->land_jump_speed * bpa->data.health/boids->health;
00732     }
00733     else {
00734         val->max_speed = boids->air_max_speed * bpa->data.health/boids->health;
00735         val->max_acc = boids->air_max_acc * val->max_speed;
00736         val->max_ave = boids->air_max_ave * (float)M_PI * bpa->data.health/boids->health;
00737         val->min_speed = boids->air_min_speed * boids->air_max_speed;
00738         val->personal_space = boids->air_personal_space;
00739         val->jump_speed = 0.0f; /* no jumping in air */
00740     }
00741 }
00742 
00743 static Object *boid_find_ground(BoidBrainData *bbd, ParticleData *pa, float ground_co[3], float ground_nor[3])
00744 {
00745     BoidParticle *bpa = pa->boid;
00746 
00747     if (bpa->data.mode == eBoidMode_Climbing) {
00748         SurfaceModifierData *surmd = NULL;
00749         float x[3], v[3];
00750         
00751         surmd = (SurfaceModifierData *)modifiers_findByType ( bpa->ground, eModifierType_Surface );
00752 
00753         /* take surface velocity into account */
00754         closest_point_on_surface(surmd, pa->state.co, x, NULL, v);
00755         add_v3_v3(x, v);
00756 
00757         /* get actual position on surface */
00758         closest_point_on_surface(surmd, x, ground_co, ground_nor, NULL);
00759 
00760         return bpa->ground;
00761     }
00762     else {
00763         float zvec[3] = {0.0f, 0.0f, 2000.0f};
00764         ParticleCollision col;
00765         ColliderCache *coll;
00766         BVHTreeRayHit hit;
00767         float radius = 0.0f, t, ray_dir[3];
00768 
00769         if (!bbd->sim->colliders)
00770             return NULL;
00771 
00772         /* first try to find below boid */
00773         copy_v3_v3(col.co1, pa->state.co);
00774         sub_v3_v3v3(col.co2, pa->state.co, zvec);
00775         sub_v3_v3v3(ray_dir, col.co2, col.co1);
00776         col.f = 0.0f;
00777         hit.index = -1;
00778         hit.dist = col.original_ray_length = len_v3(ray_dir);
00779         col.pce.inside = 0;
00780 
00781         for (coll = bbd->sim->colliders->first; coll; coll = coll->next) {
00782             col.current = coll->ob;
00783             col.md = coll->collmd;
00784             col.fac1 = col.fac2 = 0.f;
00785 
00786             if (col.md && col.md->bvhtree)
00787                 BLI_bvhtree_ray_cast(col.md->bvhtree, col.co1, ray_dir, radius, &hit, BKE_psys_collision_neartest_cb, &col);
00788         }
00789         /* then use that object */
00790         if (hit.index>=0) {
00791             t = hit.dist/col.original_ray_length;
00792             interp_v3_v3v3(ground_co, col.co1, col.co2, t);
00793             normalize_v3_v3(ground_nor, col.pce.nor);
00794             return col.hit;
00795         }
00796 
00797         /* couldn't find below, so find upmost deflector object */
00798         add_v3_v3v3(col.co1, pa->state.co, zvec);
00799         sub_v3_v3v3(col.co2, pa->state.co, zvec);
00800         sub_v3_v3(col.co2, zvec);
00801         sub_v3_v3v3(ray_dir, col.co2, col.co1);
00802         col.f = 0.0f;
00803         hit.index = -1;
00804         hit.dist = col.original_ray_length = len_v3(ray_dir);
00805 
00806         for (coll = bbd->sim->colliders->first; coll; coll = coll->next) {
00807             col.current = coll->ob;
00808             col.md = coll->collmd;
00809 
00810             if (col.md && col.md->bvhtree)
00811                 BLI_bvhtree_ray_cast(col.md->bvhtree, col.co1, ray_dir, radius, &hit, BKE_psys_collision_neartest_cb, &col);
00812         }
00813         /* then use that object */
00814         if (hit.index>=0) {
00815             t = hit.dist/col.original_ray_length;
00816             interp_v3_v3v3(ground_co, col.co1, col.co2, t);
00817             normalize_v3_v3(ground_nor, col.pce.nor);
00818             return col.hit;
00819         }
00820 
00821         /* default to z=0 */
00822         copy_v3_v3(ground_co, pa->state.co);
00823         ground_co[2] = 0;
00824         ground_nor[0] = ground_nor[1] = 0.0f;
00825         ground_nor[2] = 1.0f;
00826         return NULL;
00827     }
00828 }
00829 static int boid_rule_applies(ParticleData *pa, BoidSettings *UNUSED(boids), BoidRule *rule)
00830 {
00831     BoidParticle *bpa = pa->boid;
00832 
00833     if (rule==NULL)
00834         return 0;
00835     
00836     if (ELEM(bpa->data.mode, eBoidMode_OnLand, eBoidMode_Climbing) && rule->flag & BOIDRULE_ON_LAND)
00837         return 1;
00838     
00839     if (bpa->data.mode==eBoidMode_InAir && rule->flag & BOIDRULE_IN_AIR)
00840         return 1;
00841 
00842     return 0;
00843 }
00844 void boids_precalc_rules(ParticleSettings *part, float cfra)
00845 {
00846     BoidState *state = part->boids->states.first;
00847     BoidRule *rule;
00848     for (; state; state=state->next) {
00849         for (rule = state->rules.first; rule; rule=rule->next) {
00850             if (rule->type==eBoidRuleType_FollowLeader) {
00851                 BoidRuleFollowLeader *flbr = (BoidRuleFollowLeader*) rule;
00852 
00853                 if (flbr->ob && flbr->cfra != cfra) {
00854                     /* save object locations for velocity calculations */
00855                     copy_v3_v3(flbr->oloc, flbr->loc);
00856                     copy_v3_v3(flbr->loc, flbr->ob->obmat[3]);
00857                     flbr->cfra = cfra;
00858                 }
00859             }
00860         }
00861     }
00862 }
00863 static void boid_climb(BoidSettings *boids, ParticleData *pa, float *surface_co, float *surface_nor)
00864 {
00865     BoidParticle *bpa = pa->boid;
00866     float nor[3], vel[3];
00867     copy_v3_v3(nor, surface_nor);
00868 
00869     /* gather apparent gravity */
00870     madd_v3_v3fl(bpa->gravity, surface_nor, -1.0f);
00871     normalize_v3(bpa->gravity);
00872 
00873     /* raise boid it's size from surface */
00874     mul_v3_fl(nor, pa->size * boids->height);
00875     add_v3_v3v3(pa->state.co, surface_co, nor);
00876 
00877     /* remove normal component from velocity */
00878     project_v3_v3v3(vel, pa->state.vel, surface_nor);
00879     sub_v3_v3v3(pa->state.vel, pa->state.vel, vel);
00880 }
00881 static float boid_goal_signed_dist(float *boid_co, float *goal_co, float *goal_nor)
00882 {
00883     float vec[3];
00884 
00885     sub_v3_v3v3(vec, boid_co, goal_co);
00886 
00887     return dot_v3v3(vec, goal_nor);
00888 }
00889 /* wanted_co is relative to boid location */
00890 static int apply_boid_rule(BoidBrainData *bbd, BoidRule *rule, BoidValues *val, ParticleData *pa, float fuzziness)
00891 {
00892     if (rule==NULL)
00893         return 0;
00894 
00895     if (boid_rule_applies(pa, bbd->part->boids, rule)==0)
00896         return 0;
00897 
00898     if (boid_rules[rule->type](rule, bbd, val, pa)==0)
00899         return 0;
00900 
00901     if (fuzziness < 0.0f || compare_len_v3v3(bbd->wanted_co, pa->prev_state.vel, fuzziness * len_v3(pa->prev_state.vel))==0)
00902         return 1;
00903     else
00904         return 0;
00905 }
00906 static BoidState *get_boid_state(BoidSettings *boids, ParticleData *pa)
00907 {
00908     BoidState *state = boids->states.first;
00909     BoidParticle *bpa = pa->boid;
00910 
00911     for (; state; state=state->next) {
00912         if (state->id==bpa->data.state_id)
00913             return state;
00914     }
00915 
00916     /* for some reason particle isn't at a valid state */
00917     state = boids->states.first;
00918     if (state)
00919         bpa->data.state_id = state->id;
00920 
00921     return state;
00922 }
00923 //static int boid_condition_is_true(BoidCondition *cond) {
00924 //  /* TODO */
00925 //  return 0;
00926 //}
00927 
00928 /* determines the velocity the boid wants to have */
00929 void boid_brain(BoidBrainData *bbd, int p, ParticleData *pa)
00930 {
00931     BoidRule *rule;
00932     BoidSettings *boids = bbd->part->boids;
00933     BoidValues val;
00934     BoidState *state = get_boid_state(boids, pa);
00935     BoidParticle *bpa = pa->boid;
00936     ParticleSystem *psys = bbd->sim->psys;
00937     int rand;
00938     //BoidCondition *cond;
00939 
00940     if (bpa->data.health <= 0.0f) {
00941         pa->alive = PARS_DYING;
00942         pa->dietime = bbd->cfra;
00943         return;
00944     }
00945 
00946     //planned for near future
00947     //cond = state->conditions.first;
00948     //for (; cond; cond=cond->next) {
00949     //  if (boid_condition_is_true(cond)) {
00950     //      pa->boid->state_id = cond->state_id;
00951     //      state = get_boid_state(boids, pa);
00952     //      break; /* only first true condition is used */
00953     //  }
00954     //}
00955 
00956     bbd->wanted_co[0]=bbd->wanted_co[1]=bbd->wanted_co[2]=bbd->wanted_speed=0.0f;
00957 
00958     /* create random seed for every particle & frame */
00959     rand = (int)(PSYS_FRAND(psys->seed + p) * 1000);
00960     rand = (int)(PSYS_FRAND((int)bbd->cfra + rand) * 1000);
00961 
00962     set_boid_values(&val, bbd->part->boids, pa);
00963 
00964     /* go through rules */
00965     switch(state->ruleset_type) {
00966         case eBoidRulesetType_Fuzzy:
00967         {
00968             for (rule = state->rules.first; rule; rule = rule->next) {
00969                 if (apply_boid_rule(bbd, rule, &val, pa, state->rule_fuzziness))
00970                     break; /* only first nonzero rule that comes through fuzzy rule is applied */
00971             }
00972             break;
00973         }
00974         case eBoidRulesetType_Random:
00975         {
00976             /* use random rule for each particle (allways same for same particle though) */
00977             rule = BLI_findlink(&state->rules, rand % BLI_countlist(&state->rules));
00978 
00979             apply_boid_rule(bbd, rule, &val, pa, -1.0);
00980         }
00981         case eBoidRulesetType_Average:
00982         {
00983             float wanted_co[3] = {0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f}, wanted_speed = 0.0f;
00984             int n = 0;
00985             for (rule = state->rules.first; rule; rule=rule->next) {
00986                 if (apply_boid_rule(bbd, rule, &val, pa, -1.0f)) {
00987                     add_v3_v3(wanted_co, bbd->wanted_co);
00988                     wanted_speed += bbd->wanted_speed;
00989                     n++;
00990                     bbd->wanted_co[0]=bbd->wanted_co[1]=bbd->wanted_co[2]=bbd->wanted_speed=0.0f;
00991                 }
00992             }
00993 
00994             if (n > 1) {
00995                 mul_v3_fl(wanted_co, 1.0f/(float)n);
00996                 wanted_speed /= (float)n;
00997             }
00998 
00999             copy_v3_v3(bbd->wanted_co, wanted_co);
01000             bbd->wanted_speed = wanted_speed;
01001             break;
01002         }
01003 
01004     }
01005 
01006     /* decide on jumping & liftoff */
01007     if (bpa->data.mode == eBoidMode_OnLand) {
01008         /* fuzziness makes boids capable of misjudgement */
01009         float mul = 1.0f + state->rule_fuzziness;
01010         
01011         if (boids->options & BOID_ALLOW_FLIGHT && bbd->wanted_co[2] > 0.0f) {
01012             float cvel[3], dir[3];
01013 
01014             copy_v3_v3(dir, pa->prev_state.ave);
01015             normalize_v2(dir);
01016 
01017             copy_v3_v3(cvel, bbd->wanted_co);
01018             normalize_v2(cvel);
01019 
01020             if (dot_v2v2(cvel, dir) > 0.95f / mul)
01021                 bpa->data.mode = eBoidMode_Liftoff;
01022         }
01023         else if (val.jump_speed > 0.0f) {
01024             float jump_v[3];
01025             int jump = 0;
01026 
01027             /* jump to get to a location */
01028             if (bbd->wanted_co[2] > 0.0f) {
01029                 float cvel[3], dir[3];
01030                 float z_v, ground_v, cur_v;
01031                 float len;
01032 
01033                 copy_v3_v3(dir, pa->prev_state.ave);
01034                 normalize_v2(dir);
01035 
01036                 copy_v3_v3(cvel, bbd->wanted_co);
01037                 normalize_v2(cvel);
01038 
01039                 len = len_v2(pa->prev_state.vel);
01040 
01041                 /* first of all, are we going in a suitable direction? */
01042                 /* or at a suitably slow speed */
01043                 if (dot_v2v2(cvel, dir) > 0.95f / mul || len <= state->rule_fuzziness) {
01044                     /* try to reach goal at highest point of the parabolic path */
01045                     cur_v = len_v2(pa->prev_state.vel);
01046                     z_v = sasqrt(-2.0f * bbd->sim->scene->physics_settings.gravity[2] * bbd->wanted_co[2]);
01047                     ground_v = len_v2(bbd->wanted_co)*sasqrt(-0.5f * bbd->sim->scene->physics_settings.gravity[2] / bbd->wanted_co[2]);
01048 
01049                     len = sasqrt((ground_v-cur_v)*(ground_v-cur_v) + z_v*z_v);
01050 
01051                     if (len < val.jump_speed * mul || bbd->part->boids->options & BOID_ALLOW_FLIGHT) {
01052                         jump = 1;
01053 
01054                         len = MIN2(len, val.jump_speed);
01055 
01056                         copy_v3_v3(jump_v, dir);
01057                         jump_v[2] = z_v;
01058                         mul_v3_fl(jump_v, ground_v);
01059 
01060                         normalize_v3(jump_v);
01061                         mul_v3_fl(jump_v, len);
01062                         add_v2_v2v2(jump_v, jump_v, pa->prev_state.vel);
01063                     }
01064                 }
01065             }
01066 
01067             /* jump to go faster */
01068             if (jump == 0 && val.jump_speed > val.max_speed && bbd->wanted_speed > val.max_speed) {
01069                 
01070             }
01071 
01072             if (jump) {
01073                 copy_v3_v3(pa->prev_state.vel, jump_v);
01074                 bpa->data.mode = eBoidMode_Falling;
01075             }
01076         }
01077     }
01078 }
01079 /* tries to realize the wanted velocity taking all constraints into account */
01080 void boid_body(BoidBrainData *bbd, ParticleData *pa)
01081 {
01082     BoidSettings *boids = bbd->part->boids;
01083     BoidParticle *bpa = pa->boid;
01084     BoidValues val;
01085     EffectedPoint epoint;
01086     float acc[3] = {0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f}, tan_acc[3], nor_acc[3];
01087     float dvec[3], bvec[3];
01088     float new_dir[3], new_speed;
01089     float old_dir[3], old_speed;
01090     float wanted_dir[3];
01091     float q[4], mat[3][3]; /* rotation */
01092     float ground_co[3] = {0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f}, ground_nor[3] = {0.0f, 0.0f, 1.0f};
01093     float force[3] = {0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f};
01094     float pa_mass=bbd->part->mass, dtime=bbd->dfra*bbd->timestep;
01095 
01096     set_boid_values(&val, boids, pa);
01097 
01098     /* make sure there's something in new velocity, location & rotation */
01099     copy_particle_key(&pa->state,&pa->prev_state,0);
01100 
01101     if (bbd->part->flag & PART_SIZEMASS)
01102         pa_mass*=pa->size;
01103 
01104     /* if boids can't fly they fall to the ground */
01105     if ((boids->options & BOID_ALLOW_FLIGHT)==0 && ELEM(bpa->data.mode, eBoidMode_OnLand, eBoidMode_Climbing)==0 && psys_uses_gravity(bbd->sim))
01106         bpa->data.mode = eBoidMode_Falling;
01107 
01108     if (bpa->data.mode == eBoidMode_Falling) {
01109         /* Falling boids are only effected by gravity. */
01110         acc[2] = bbd->sim->scene->physics_settings.gravity[2];
01111     }
01112     else {
01113         /* figure out acceleration */
01114         float landing_level = 2.0f;
01115         float level = landing_level + 1.0f;
01116         float new_vel[3];
01117 
01118         if (bpa->data.mode == eBoidMode_Liftoff) {
01119             bpa->data.mode = eBoidMode_InAir;
01120             bpa->ground = boid_find_ground(bbd, pa, ground_co, ground_nor);
01121         }
01122         else if (bpa->data.mode == eBoidMode_InAir && boids->options & BOID_ALLOW_LAND) {
01123             /* auto-leveling & landing if close to ground */
01124 
01125             bpa->ground = boid_find_ground(bbd, pa, ground_co, ground_nor);
01126             
01127             /* level = how many particle sizes above ground */
01128             level = (pa->prev_state.co[2] - ground_co[2])/(2.0f * pa->size) - 0.5f;
01129 
01130             landing_level = - boids->landing_smoothness * pa->prev_state.vel[2] * pa_mass;
01131 
01132             if (pa->prev_state.vel[2] < 0.0f) {
01133                 if (level < 1.0f) {
01134                     bbd->wanted_co[0] = bbd->wanted_co[1] = bbd->wanted_co[2] = 0.0f;
01135                     bbd->wanted_speed = 0.0f;
01136                     bpa->data.mode = eBoidMode_Falling;
01137                 }
01138                 else if (level < landing_level) {
01139                     bbd->wanted_speed *= (level - 1.0f)/landing_level;
01140                     bbd->wanted_co[2] *= (level - 1.0f)/landing_level;
01141                 }
01142             }
01143         }
01144 
01145         copy_v3_v3(old_dir, pa->prev_state.ave);
01146         new_speed = normalize_v3_v3(wanted_dir, bbd->wanted_co);
01147 
01148         /* first check if we have valid direction we want to go towards */
01149         if (new_speed == 0.0f) {
01150             copy_v3_v3(new_dir, old_dir);
01151         }
01152         else {
01153             float old_dir2[2], wanted_dir2[2], nor[3], angle;
01154             copy_v2_v2(old_dir2, old_dir);
01155             normalize_v2(old_dir2);
01156             copy_v2_v2(wanted_dir2, wanted_dir);
01157             normalize_v2(wanted_dir2);
01158 
01159             /* choose random direction to turn if wanted velocity */
01160             /* is directly behind regardless of z-coordinate */
01161             if (dot_v2v2(old_dir2, wanted_dir2) < -0.99f) {
01162                 wanted_dir[0] = 2.0f*(0.5f - BLI_frand());
01163                 wanted_dir[1] = 2.0f*(0.5f - BLI_frand());
01164                 wanted_dir[2] = 2.0f*(0.5f - BLI_frand());
01165                 normalize_v3(wanted_dir);
01166             }
01167 
01168             /* constrain direction with maximum angular velocity */
01169             angle = saacos(dot_v3v3(old_dir, wanted_dir));
01170             angle = MIN2(angle, val.max_ave);
01171 
01172             cross_v3_v3v3(nor, old_dir, wanted_dir);
01173             axis_angle_to_quat( q,nor, angle);
01174             copy_v3_v3(new_dir, old_dir);
01175             mul_qt_v3(q, new_dir);
01176             normalize_v3(new_dir);
01177 
01178             /* save direction in case resulting velocity too small */
01179             axis_angle_to_quat( q,nor, angle*dtime);
01180             copy_v3_v3(pa->state.ave, old_dir);
01181             mul_qt_v3(q, pa->state.ave);
01182             normalize_v3(pa->state.ave);
01183         }
01184 
01185         /* constrain speed with maximum acceleration */
01186         old_speed = len_v3(pa->prev_state.vel);
01187         
01188         if (bbd->wanted_speed < old_speed)
01189             new_speed = MAX2(bbd->wanted_speed, old_speed - val.max_acc);
01190         else
01191             new_speed = MIN2(bbd->wanted_speed, old_speed + val.max_acc);
01192 
01193         /* combine direction and speed */
01194         copy_v3_v3(new_vel, new_dir);
01195         mul_v3_fl(new_vel, new_speed);
01196 
01197         /* maintain minimum flying velocity if not landing */
01198         if (level >= landing_level) {
01199             float len2 = dot_v2v2(new_vel,new_vel);
01200             float root;
01201 
01202             len2 = MAX2(len2, val.min_speed*val.min_speed);
01203             root = sasqrt(new_speed*new_speed - len2);
01204 
01205             new_vel[2] = new_vel[2] < 0.0f ? -root : root;
01206 
01207             normalize_v2(new_vel);
01208             mul_v2_fl(new_vel, sasqrt(len2));
01209         }
01210 
01211         /* finally constrain speed to max speed */
01212         new_speed = normalize_v3(new_vel);
01213         mul_v3_fl(new_vel, MIN2(new_speed, val.max_speed));
01214 
01215         /* get acceleration from difference of velocities */
01216         sub_v3_v3v3(acc, new_vel, pa->prev_state.vel);
01217 
01218         /* break acceleration to components */
01219         project_v3_v3v3(tan_acc, acc, pa->prev_state.ave);
01220         sub_v3_v3v3(nor_acc, acc, tan_acc);
01221     }
01222 
01223     /* account for effectors */
01224     pd_point_from_particle(bbd->sim, pa, &pa->state, &epoint);
01225     pdDoEffectors(bbd->sim->psys->effectors, bbd->sim->colliders, bbd->part->effector_weights, &epoint, force, NULL);
01226 
01227     if (ELEM(bpa->data.mode, eBoidMode_OnLand, eBoidMode_Climbing)) {
01228         float length = normalize_v3(force);
01229 
01230         length = MAX2(0.0f, length - boids->land_stick_force);
01231 
01232         mul_v3_fl(force, length);
01233     }
01234     
01235     add_v3_v3(acc, force);
01236 
01237     /* store smoothed acceleration for nice banking etc. */
01238     madd_v3_v3fl(bpa->data.acc, acc, dtime);
01239     mul_v3_fl(bpa->data.acc, 1.0f / (1.0f + dtime));
01240 
01241     /* integrate new location & velocity */
01242 
01243     /* by regarding the acceleration as a force at this stage we*/
01244     /* can get better control allthough it's a bit unphysical   */
01245     mul_v3_fl(acc, 1.0f/pa_mass);
01246 
01247     copy_v3_v3(dvec, acc);
01248     mul_v3_fl(dvec, dtime*dtime*0.5f);
01249     
01250     copy_v3_v3(bvec, pa->prev_state.vel);
01251     mul_v3_fl(bvec, dtime);
01252     add_v3_v3(dvec, bvec);
01253     add_v3_v3(pa->state.co, dvec);
01254 
01255     madd_v3_v3fl(pa->state.vel, acc, dtime);
01256 
01257     //if (bpa->data.mode != eBoidMode_InAir)
01258     bpa->ground = boid_find_ground(bbd, pa, ground_co, ground_nor);
01259 
01260     /* change modes, constrain movement & keep track of down vector */
01261     switch(bpa->data.mode) {
01262         case eBoidMode_InAir:
01263         {
01264             float grav[3];
01265 
01266             grav[0]= 0.0f;
01267             grav[1]= 0.0f;
01268             grav[2]= bbd->sim->scene->physics_settings.gravity[2] < 0.0f ? -1.0f : 0.0f;
01269 
01270             /* don't take forward acceleration into account (better banking) */
01271             if (dot_v3v3(bpa->data.acc, pa->state.vel) > 0.0f) {
01272                 project_v3_v3v3(dvec, bpa->data.acc, pa->state.vel);
01273                 sub_v3_v3v3(dvec, bpa->data.acc, dvec);
01274             }
01275             else {
01276                 copy_v3_v3(dvec, bpa->data.acc);
01277             }
01278 
01279             /* gather apparent gravity */
01280             madd_v3_v3v3fl(bpa->gravity, grav, dvec, -boids->banking);
01281             normalize_v3(bpa->gravity);
01282 
01283             /* stick boid on goal when close enough */
01284             if (bbd->goal_ob && boid_goal_signed_dist(pa->state.co, bbd->goal_co, bbd->goal_nor) <= pa->size * boids->height) {
01285                 bpa->data.mode = eBoidMode_Climbing;
01286                 bpa->ground = bbd->goal_ob;
01287                 boid_find_ground(bbd, pa, ground_co, ground_nor);
01288                 boid_climb(boids, pa, ground_co, ground_nor);
01289             }
01290             else if (pa->state.co[2] <= ground_co[2] + pa->size * boids->height) {
01291                 /* land boid when below ground */
01292                 if (boids->options & BOID_ALLOW_LAND) {
01293                     pa->state.co[2] = ground_co[2] + pa->size * boids->height;
01294                     pa->state.vel[2] = 0.0f;
01295                     bpa->data.mode = eBoidMode_OnLand;
01296                 }
01297                 /* fly above ground */
01298                 else if (bpa->ground) {
01299                     pa->state.co[2] = ground_co[2] + pa->size * boids->height;
01300                     pa->state.vel[2] = 0.0f;
01301                 }
01302             }
01303             break;
01304         }
01305         case eBoidMode_Falling:
01306         {
01307             float grav[3];
01308 
01309             grav[0]= 0.0f;
01310             grav[1]= 0.0f;
01311             grav[2]= bbd->sim->scene->physics_settings.gravity[2] < 0.0f ? -1.0f : 0.0f;
01312 
01313 
01314             /* gather apparent gravity */
01315             madd_v3_v3fl(bpa->gravity, grav, dtime);
01316             normalize_v3(bpa->gravity);
01317 
01318             if (boids->options & BOID_ALLOW_LAND) {
01319                 /* stick boid on goal when close enough */
01320                 if (bbd->goal_ob && boid_goal_signed_dist(pa->state.co, bbd->goal_co, bbd->goal_nor) <= pa->size * boids->height) {
01321                     bpa->data.mode = eBoidMode_Climbing;
01322                     bpa->ground = bbd->goal_ob;
01323                     boid_find_ground(bbd, pa, ground_co, ground_nor);
01324                     boid_climb(boids, pa, ground_co, ground_nor);
01325                 }
01326                 /* land boid when really near ground */
01327                 else if (pa->state.co[2] <= ground_co[2] + 1.01f * pa->size * boids->height) {
01328                     pa->state.co[2] = ground_co[2] + pa->size * boids->height;
01329                     pa->state.vel[2] = 0.0f;
01330                     bpa->data.mode = eBoidMode_OnLand;
01331                 }
01332                 /* if we're falling, can fly and want to go upwards lets fly */
01333                 else if (boids->options & BOID_ALLOW_FLIGHT && bbd->wanted_co[2] > 0.0f)
01334                     bpa->data.mode = eBoidMode_InAir;
01335             }
01336             else
01337                 bpa->data.mode = eBoidMode_InAir;
01338             break;
01339         }
01340         case eBoidMode_Climbing:
01341         {
01342             boid_climb(boids, pa, ground_co, ground_nor);
01343             //float nor[3];
01344             //copy_v3_v3(nor, ground_nor);
01345 
01347             //madd_v3_v3fl(pa->r_ve, ground_nor, -1.0);
01348             //normalize_v3(pa->r_ve);
01349 
01351             //mul_v3_fl(nor, pa->size * boids->height);
01352             //add_v3_v3v3(pa->state.co, ground_co, nor);
01353 
01355             //project_v3_v3v3(v, pa->state.vel, ground_nor);
01356             //sub_v3_v3v3(pa->state.vel, pa->state.vel, v);
01357             break;
01358         }
01359         case eBoidMode_OnLand:
01360         {
01361             /* stick boid on goal when close enough */
01362             if (bbd->goal_ob && boid_goal_signed_dist(pa->state.co, bbd->goal_co, bbd->goal_nor) <= pa->size * boids->height) {
01363                 bpa->data.mode = eBoidMode_Climbing;
01364                 bpa->ground = bbd->goal_ob;
01365                 boid_find_ground(bbd, pa, ground_co, ground_nor);
01366                 boid_climb(boids, pa, ground_co, ground_nor);
01367             }
01368             /* ground is too far away so boid falls */
01369             else if (pa->state.co[2]-ground_co[2] > 1.1f * pa->size * boids->height)
01370                 bpa->data.mode = eBoidMode_Falling;
01371             else {
01372                 /* constrain to surface */
01373                 pa->state.co[2] = ground_co[2] + pa->size * boids->height;
01374                 pa->state.vel[2] = 0.0f;
01375             }
01376 
01377             if (boids->banking > 0.0f) {
01378                 float grav[3];
01379                 /* Don't take gravity's strength in to account, */
01380                 /* otherwise amount of banking is hard to control. */
01381                 negate_v3_v3(grav, ground_nor);
01382 
01383                 project_v3_v3v3(dvec, bpa->data.acc, pa->state.vel);
01384                 sub_v3_v3v3(dvec, bpa->data.acc, dvec);
01385 
01386                 /* gather apparent gravity */
01387                 madd_v3_v3v3fl(bpa->gravity, grav, dvec, -boids->banking);
01388                 normalize_v3(bpa->gravity);
01389             }
01390             else {
01391                 /* gather negative surface normal */
01392                 madd_v3_v3fl(bpa->gravity, ground_nor, -1.0f);
01393                 normalize_v3(bpa->gravity);
01394             }
01395             break;
01396         }
01397     }
01398 
01399     /* save direction to state.ave unless the boid is falling */
01400     /* (boids can't effect their direction when falling) */
01401     if (bpa->data.mode!=eBoidMode_Falling && len_v3(pa->state.vel) > 0.1f*pa->size) {
01402         copy_v3_v3(pa->state.ave, pa->state.vel);
01403         pa->state.ave[2] *= bbd->part->boids->pitch;
01404         normalize_v3(pa->state.ave);
01405     }
01406 
01407     /* apply damping */
01408     if (ELEM(bpa->data.mode, eBoidMode_OnLand, eBoidMode_Climbing))
01409         mul_v3_fl(pa->state.vel, 1.0f - 0.2f*bbd->part->dampfac);
01410 
01411     /* calculate rotation matrix based on forward & down vectors */
01412     if (bpa->data.mode == eBoidMode_InAir) {
01413         copy_v3_v3(mat[0], pa->state.ave);
01414 
01415         project_v3_v3v3(dvec, bpa->gravity, pa->state.ave);
01416         sub_v3_v3v3(mat[2], bpa->gravity, dvec);
01417         normalize_v3(mat[2]);
01418     }
01419     else {
01420         project_v3_v3v3(dvec, pa->state.ave, bpa->gravity);
01421         sub_v3_v3v3(mat[0], pa->state.ave, dvec);
01422         normalize_v3(mat[0]);
01423 
01424         copy_v3_v3(mat[2], bpa->gravity);
01425     }
01426     negate_v3(mat[2]);
01427     cross_v3_v3v3(mat[1], mat[2], mat[0]);
01428     
01429     /* apply rotation */
01430     mat3_to_quat_is_ok( q,mat);
01431     copy_qt_qt(pa->state.rot, q);
01432 }
01433 
01434 BoidRule *boid_new_rule(int type)
01435 {
01436     BoidRule *rule = NULL;
01437     if (type <= 0)
01438         return NULL;
01439 
01440     switch(type) {
01441         case eBoidRuleType_Goal:
01442         case eBoidRuleType_Avoid:
01443             rule = MEM_callocN(sizeof(BoidRuleGoalAvoid), "BoidRuleGoalAvoid");
01444             break;
01445         case eBoidRuleType_AvoidCollision:
01446             rule = MEM_callocN(sizeof(BoidRuleAvoidCollision), "BoidRuleAvoidCollision");
01447             ((BoidRuleAvoidCollision*)rule)->look_ahead = 2.0f;
01448             break;
01449         case eBoidRuleType_FollowLeader:
01450             rule = MEM_callocN(sizeof(BoidRuleFollowLeader), "BoidRuleFollowLeader");
01451             ((BoidRuleFollowLeader*)rule)->distance = 1.0f;
01452             break;
01453         case eBoidRuleType_AverageSpeed:
01454             rule = MEM_callocN(sizeof(BoidRuleAverageSpeed), "BoidRuleAverageSpeed");
01455             ((BoidRuleAverageSpeed*)rule)->speed = 0.5f;
01456             break;
01457         case eBoidRuleType_Fight:
01458             rule = MEM_callocN(sizeof(BoidRuleFight), "BoidRuleFight");
01459             ((BoidRuleFight*)rule)->distance = 100.0f;
01460             ((BoidRuleFight*)rule)->flee_distance = 100.0f;
01461             break;
01462         default:
01463             rule = MEM_callocN(sizeof(BoidRule), "BoidRule");
01464             break;
01465     }
01466 
01467     rule->type = type;
01468     rule->flag |= BOIDRULE_IN_AIR|BOIDRULE_ON_LAND;
01469     BLI_strncpy(rule->name, boidrule_type_items[type-1].name, sizeof(rule->name));
01470 
01471     return rule;
01472 }
01473 void boid_default_settings(BoidSettings *boids)
01474 {
01475     boids->air_max_speed = 10.0f;
01476     boids->air_max_acc = 0.5f;
01477     boids->air_max_ave = 0.5f;
01478     boids->air_personal_space = 1.0f;
01479 
01480     boids->land_max_speed = 5.0f;
01481     boids->land_max_acc = 0.5f;
01482     boids->land_max_ave = 0.5f;
01483     boids->land_personal_space = 1.0f;
01484 
01485     boids->options = BOID_ALLOW_FLIGHT;
01486 
01487     boids->landing_smoothness = 3.0f;
01488     boids->banking = 1.0f;
01489     boids->pitch = 1.0f;
01490     boids->height = 1.0f;
01491 
01492     boids->health = 1.0f;
01493     boids->accuracy = 1.0f;
01494     boids->aggression = 2.0f;
01495     boids->range = 1.0f;
01496     boids->strength = 0.1f;
01497 }
01498 
01499 BoidState *boid_new_state(BoidSettings *boids)
01500 {
01501     BoidState *state = MEM_callocN(sizeof(BoidState), "BoidState");
01502 
01503     state->id = boids->last_state_id++;
01504     if (state->id)
01505         BLI_snprintf(state->name, sizeof(state->name), "State %i", state->id);
01506     else
01507         strcpy(state->name, "State");
01508 
01509     state->rule_fuzziness = 0.5;
01510     state->volume = 1.0f;
01511     state->channels |= ~0;
01512 
01513     return state;
01514 }
01515 
01516 BoidState *boid_duplicate_state(BoidSettings *boids, BoidState *state)
01517 {
01518     BoidState *staten = MEM_dupallocN(state);
01519 
01520     BLI_duplicatelist(&staten->rules, &state->rules);
01521     BLI_duplicatelist(&staten->conditions, &state->conditions);
01522     BLI_duplicatelist(&staten->actions, &state->actions);
01523 
01524     staten->id = boids->last_state_id++;
01525 
01526     return staten;
01527 }
01528 void boid_free_settings(BoidSettings *boids)
01529 {
01530     if (boids) {
01531         BoidState *state = boids->states.first;
01532 
01533         for (; state; state=state->next) {
01534             BLI_freelistN(&state->rules);
01535             BLI_freelistN(&state->conditions);
01536             BLI_freelistN(&state->actions);
01537         }
01538 
01539         BLI_freelistN(&boids->states);
01540 
01541         MEM_freeN(boids);
01542     }
01543 }
01544 BoidSettings *boid_copy_settings(BoidSettings *boids)
01545 {
01546     BoidSettings *nboids = NULL;
01547 
01548     if (boids) {
01549         BoidState *state;
01550         BoidState *nstate;
01551 
01552         nboids = MEM_dupallocN(boids);
01553 
01554         BLI_duplicatelist(&nboids->states, &boids->states);
01555 
01556         state = boids->states.first;
01557         nstate = nboids->states.first;
01558         for (; state; state=state->next, nstate=nstate->next) {
01559             BLI_duplicatelist(&nstate->rules, &state->rules);
01560             BLI_duplicatelist(&nstate->conditions, &state->conditions);
01561             BLI_duplicatelist(&nstate->actions, &state->actions);
01562         }
01563     }
01564 
01565     return nboids;
01566 }
01567 BoidState *boid_get_current_state(BoidSettings *boids)
01568 {
01569     BoidState *state = boids->states.first;
01570 
01571     for (; state; state=state->next) {
01572         if (state->flag & BOIDSTATE_CURRENT)
01573             break;
01574     }
01575 
01576     return state;
01577 }
